Actions.Text: REFERRED TO LIBRARIES AND EDUCATION TECHNOLOGY

Title: Prohibits an individual with a vested interest or government agency from having a cause of action against a library staff member who refuses to remove such library materials
Summary: Prohibits an individual with a vested interest or government agency from having a cause of action against a library staff member who refuses to remove such library materials whether such library materials belongs to a school or public library.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to prohibiting a cause of action for refusing a request to remove library materials
